article.Heading: Impact of GST has been negative till now: Urban Ladder's CEO, Ashish Goel
article.Summary: Ashish Goel, CEO of online furniture seller Urban Ladder - says the impact of GST has been negative on the firm so far. In a conversation with CNBC-TV18's Rukmini Rao, Goel added that Urban Ladder expects a 5 to 7 percent hike in prices due to GST impact.
article.Body:
Ashish Goel, CEO of online furniture seller Urban Ladder - says the impact of GST has been negative on the firm so far. In a conversation with CNBC-TV18's Rukmini Rao, Goel added that Urban Ladder expects a 5 to 7 percent hike in prices due to GST impact.

Watch video for moreâ€¦.
